name: calendar-app
description: A calendar application with frontend and backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && npm start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
